atomica.logic.pathfinding
Class Path

java.lang.Object
  atomica.logic.pathfinding.Path

public class Path
extends java.lang.Object

A Path represents a list of fields which define a way from a starting field to a destination field.

Author:
Georg Ludewig

Field Summary
private  java.util.ArrayList<Field> pathFields
          The list of fields defining the path.
 
Constructor Summary
Path()
          Creates an empty path.
 
Method Summary
 Field get(int n)
          Returns the field at the specific position of the path.
 void prependField(Field field)
          Prepends the given field to the path list.
 int size()
          Returns the number of fields defining the current path.
